title: Robert Downey Jr - 2005 - The Futurist - MP3 - 320kbps
description:
Debut CD from Oscar-nominated actor Robert Downey, Jr.
Title: The Futurist
Released: 2005
Format: MP3-320kbps
Extras: Cover art, two wallpapers
Homepage: http://www.robertdowneyjrmusic.com/

Review from AllMusic.com: "Vocally, Downey has a unique sound that falls somewhere between the melancholy twang of Bruce Hornsby and the soulful grit of Joe Cocker ... The actor turns out to be a great interpreter of other musicians&#039; work ... The Futurist is as unpredictably moving as the best of Downey&#039;s film work."
